text: Ma zora han Jisua Ratha Inthiengin10:21: Ratha Inthiengin miziek senkhat ngei chu Ratha han; an tia senkhat nôk chu a ratha han tiin an dôn. a sipa, “O Pa, invân le pilchung Pumapa, mivâr, mi theithiem ngei kôma ni ip, mi inmôlngei kôma nu phuong sikin nang ki minpâk. Ani, O Pa, maha nu lungdo le na nuomlam tak ani,” a tia.
